title: Haven't received second worlds icon yet
body: It's been over 2 weeks since I've hit 34 points, and I haven't received my second icon. I've asked multiple people and everyone else seems to have it. Are the icons still being sent out?

replies.body: If you haven't received your icon yet, we'd be happy to help you individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Grab a screenshot of your pick em page, showing both being signed into your account and the points you achieved to help!  We'll reply as soon as we can!
Alright I've submitted a request. Thank you!
